CC1352P2_CC2652P_launchpad_router_202211.notes:
Allow to set transmit power
Fix directly connected Xiaomi devices disconnecting
SDK 6.30.00.84

CC1352P2_CC2652P_other_router_20221102.b.notes:
Allow to set transmit power
Fix directly connected Xiaomi devices disconnecting
SDK 6.30.00.84

router_CC2652P_E72_sdk_5_10_00_48_202108.notes:
Alex Egony build based on Koenkk patches for Z-Stack_3.x.0
DC/DC converter enabled
Built for CC2652P1F chip variant (not for CC1352P1F)
Default TX power: 20dBm
LEDs are supported, but not used
SDK 5.10.00.48

router_CC2652P_RFS_sdk_5_10_00_48_202108.notes:
Alex Egony build based on Koenkk patches for Z-Stack_3.x.0
Built for CC2652P1F chip variant (not for CC1352P1F)
Default TX power: 20dBm
LEDs are supported, but not used
SDK 5.10.00.48

CC1352P2_CC2652P_other_coordinator_20230.notes:
Enable child aging to fix issues like #13478 (but not for older Xiaomi devices as they do not implement child aging correctly which gets them kicked out of the network)
Increase message timeout from 7 to 8 seconds to increase message delivery success rate for devices using a 7.5 seconds poll interval (#13478)
Improve performance with larger network
Optimize table sizes
Increase stack_size from 1024 to 8192
Add firmware for CC1352P7 and CC2652R7
SimpleLink SDK 7.10.00.98

CC1352P2_CC2652P_other_coordinator_20221.notes:
Improve performance/reliability for larger network (100+ devices)
Increase request retry attempts
Increase routing table sizes
SimpleLink SDK 6.10.01.01 (changelog)
